[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: Require(
                RequireExpression {
                    require: Span {
                        line: 3,
                        column: 1,
                        position: 7,
                    },
                    path: Concat(
                        ConcatExpression {
                            left: MagicConstant(
                                Directory(
                                    Span {
                                        line: 3,
                                        column: 9,
                                        position: 15,
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            dot: Span {
                                line: 3,
                                column: 17,
                                position: 23,
                            },
                            right: Literal(
                                String(
                                    LiteralString {
                                        value: "'/foo.php'",
                                        span: Span {
                                            line: 3,
                                            column: 19,
                                            position: 25,
                                        },
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                },
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 29,
                    position: 35,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
